Key: All right, the living room is clean.
I cleaned my room and the bathroom...
So all that's left is... the entrance area?

Am I stressing about it too much? Well, I still have
some time before Kurumi comes, so I'll just do it.

(That day, I was cleaning harder than usual since
Kurumi was going to hang out at my place.)
Hmm... I guess that does it for the entrance.

But man, she told me she wanted to visit so
suddenly...
(Kurumi called me last night.)
Hello, Itsuka residence.
Shido-san. Good evening. I'm sorry to call so late.
Kurumi? What's the matter?
I wanted to ask you something.
Shido-san. Do you have any plans tomorrow?

...Tomorrow? Not really. I was going to just hang out
at home. We're going on a date the day after tomorrow,
right?
Then that's perfect!
You see. I had a favor to ask of you.
...A favor?
Yes. I've always wanted to visit your room, Shido-san.
Um... So that means...
You want to come over?
Yes... Would it be an inconvenience to you?

No, that's not it. It just came out of nowhere, so
I was just surprised.
No one's here tomorrow, so feel free to visit.

My, how wonderful. Tomorrow, then. I'll visit around
three.
Got it. I'll be waiting for you.
Hehehe... Well, good night, Shido-san.
Okay. See you tomorrow.
(And here we are.)
The entrance is good.
It's almost time for her to come.

(I looked at the empty living room and sighed. Kotori
is spending the night at Tohka's place. They planned
it a long time ago.)
So we're alone today...

(It's not the first time Kurumi's visited out of the blue
and seen our living room, but...)
Comiiiing!
Hello, Shido-san.

(I opened the door and Kurumi was standing there
the same way she always has.)
Welcome, Kurumi.
Thank you for letting me visit today.
Of course. Do enter, my lady.
Hehe... Oh, Shido-san...

(Kurumi smiled and passed through the entrance.
In her hands was a box of cake she seemed to have
brought as a gift.)

(We're about to be alone in a room together. Actually
being in this situation made my heart pound so fast.
This is going to be pretty tough...)
Feel free to sit anywhere.
Hehehe. So this is your room, huh.
Yeah. Sorry it's messy.
Not at all. It's very tidy.

(It was just an ordinary room, but Kurumi seemed to
be very curious about what was inside.)
I see...
U-Um... I'm going to go make some tea.

Oh, and I brought some cake. Could I ask you to take
care of this as well?
Thanks. Black tea okay?
Yes, please.

Got it. I have to boil some water, so hang on a
minute.

Oh. Feel free to read any magazines or manga lying
around until I get back.
Okay. So I can read anything?
Yeah, of course. Make yourself at home.

...I see. Then I suppose I'll take you up on your
offer.

(I left Kurumi in my room and headed towards the
living room. I am going to make tea and think over
my game plan.)
Where are the tea leaves―There they are. Okay.
So... What to do...

Hm. Kotori bought a new game. I think it has a versus
mode...
...I wonder if Kurumi plays games.

(I boiled water and prepared two tea cups. I was
saving them for a day like this. I'm sure the cup's
happy that it can finally be used.)

No, if a girlfriend visits, you shouldn't just play
video games. That feels wrong...
(Well, I guess some people would prefer that.)
Well, I guess I'll be my usual self and talk to her.

Oh, I know. It might be nice to plan our next date
together.
Um... I mean we are alone...

(The minute I said that, my train of thought stopped.
That's right. Today, Kurumi and I are alone in the
house.)
No. No, no. In my room now is―

(In my room is Kurumi Tokisaki, a very aggressive
and audacious girl. For an instant, I imagined Kurumi
posing in all sorts of ways.)
*gasp*... No, no, no, I can't!

I-I know! I'll discuss the next date with her! Yeah,
we'll be wholesome! Yeah, innocent. Yup!

(I tried to restrain myself by stressing that we'd
just have a wholesome and innocent time together as I
brought the tray back to my room.)

(When I returned to my room Kurumi seemed to be
looking at a magazine. She seemed very serious. I
put the tray on the table and called for Kurumi.)
Hey, Kurumi. The tea's ready.
My, Shido-san.
What magazine are you reading?
Oh, this...? Well...
Special Edition: A Lesson in Love - Hot Teacher\nTutors Student in Forbidden Subjects and Grades His\nPerformance in the Bedroom.
Ah, that magazine...
Wait, what?!
Shido-san. Do you prefer these kinds of situations?
No, no, no, no! Anything but that!

Especially the scene where the hot teacher looks
enticing and is lifting her skirt, even I―
Kurumi-san, please! DOOOOOON'T!

(I took the magazine from Kurumi and hid it in my
arms.)
H-How did this book...?!

You said I could read whatever I wanted, so I started
with the ones under your bed.
Wh-Why did you target that area...?!

You have a little sister. I figured you wouldn't have
them in an easily accessible location. And besides...
B-Besides...?

Wanting to know your boyfriend's secrets is a very
normal desire.
Th-That may be true, but...

Anyways... I didn't know you liked these things,
Shido-san.
Huh?
(Kurumi gave a naughty smile. I gulped and continued.)
W-Well... um...

The fact that you're hiding it as a
precious thing...
That's what it means, right?
N-No, it's not like that... Listen to me, Kurumi.
Besides, this book isn't mine. It's Tonomachi's.

He forced it on me... Well, I'm also a wholesome boy,
so I couldn't help it, and...

Um... I guess there's nothing I could do but hide it
under my bed, and uh...
So, Shido-san... Answer my question.
Huh? ...What?
Do you like those kinds of situations?
...What?!
Those poses... Do you not like them, Shido-san?
Well.. um.

(I neither like them or hate them... I was so nervous,
I didn't know how to answer.)
Hehe. You can be honest, you know?

(Kurumi doesn't seem mad. Seeing that, I started to
calm down.)
W-Well, I don't hate it, but...
My...
Shido-san, that's your fetish, isn't it?
H-Hey wait! It's not a fetish...

(I blushed and tried to refute her assumptions. Just
then, Kurumi looked naughty and slowly sat down on
my bed.)
K-Kurumi...?

Shido-san. You said there was no one else here today,
right?
Well, yeah...
Then Shido-san... Why don't we do this?
(Kurumi then grabbed her skirt―)
―Hey, what are you doing?!

My, it's easy. I figured I'd replicate the scene for
you.
Re...plicate...

(The person in the photo and Kurumi in front of me
were both doing the same pose. If she does that, I...)

Hehehe... You don't have to restrain yourself,
Shido-san...
(Kurumi grabbed her skirt once again. I―)
Don't tease me!
Please.
Wha―
D-Don't tease me!

(I blushed and I answered a little angrily. I crossed
my arms and turned away from Kurumi.)

(I wasn't really mad. But seeing Kurumi like that, I
got scared that I wouldn't be able to hold myself
back.)
My... Did I anger you?
Hey... Shido-san.

(This is a good opportunity. I'm going to ignore her
so I can regain my cool.)
...Shido...san.
I'm sorry. I guess I was a little too mean.
Let me apologize... So please look at me.

(Kurumi must have read the air and started to panic
a little.)
Well if you feel bad, then I guess―
(I looked towards Kurumi.)
(Seeing Kurumi... I was dumbfounded.)
Hey wait, Kurumi! Wh-What are you doing?!
...Isn't it obvious?
I'm expressing my apologies toward you.
What...

(Kurumi lifted her skirt and had the same smirk as
she stared into my eyes.)

Here, Shido-san... You can come closer to get a better
look...

K-Kurumi, let's calm down. I think you're confused
right now...!
That's not true... Look.
S-Stop!

(I literally covered my eyes. My cheeks were burning
hot.)
...Shido-san.
Y-Yef?!
Look at me.
(I froze. I could see a little through my fingers.)

(The skirt was being lifted up like a curtain, and
eventually her knees were starting to make an
appearance.)
H-Hey Kurumi, you can't!
Shido-san. Don't be like that...
Here... You can see all you want.
Hehehe...

(Eventually she was inching toward the forbidden delta
zone. I couldn't help but stare from between my
fingers.)

(Eventually, I felt a spark ignite on the battlefield of
my self-restraint. Ahh... I can't take it anymore! I
charged toward Kurumi!)
N-NO MOREEE!
...Huh? AH!
Kurumi. You've gone too far...

(I grabbed Kurumi's hand and made her stop. Kurumi
looked confused.)

But I wouldn't have minded if you had just pushed me
down.
I mind.
Gosh... You're such a late bloomer...
(Kurumi pouted as if she were unsatisfied.)
W-Well but... I feel like it's too early for that...
...I see. But I won't just stop it today.

(Kurumi gave a mischievous giggle, and I couldn't help
but feel my heart flutter.)
P-Please...

(Kurumi's sensual allure and the whole situation
finally made me say it.)
My, my... Hehehe...
―Hey! No, I take it back! I was kidding!
I-It was a slip of the tongue!
...Were you really kidding?
Huh?
I want you to be honest.
S-Stop... Don't, Kurumi...
Hehehe...

(Kurumi ignored me and slowly started to lift her
skirt.)
*grunt*...

(As Kurumi lifted her skirt, I saw the black tights that
wrapped around her legs give off a bewitching spark.
I was mesmerized.)
Hehehe. I can feel the heat of your gaze, Shido-san.

Seeing you look at me that way... I'm starting to feel
naughty.

(Kurumi still kept her sensual gaze on me. As if... she
was luring me in...)
Come, Shido-san... Have a closer look...
K-Kurumi...

(My mind tells me not to look, but my eyes... I can't
take them off her. That's how bewitching Kurumi is.)
Hey, Shido-san...
You can... come closer, you know.
Oh no, I don't think I can do that.
Then, I'll do it so you can see from there...
Hey, wait!

Now... you can't. I want you to look even closer and
closer.

(And she finally got to the final delta zone. I recalled
the daydream I had back in the living room. What's
going to happen to me? What's going to happen?!)
Hm? A message.
My, how unfortunate... Someone got in the way.
S-Sorry...

(I apologized, but I felt relieved deep inside. I didn't
know what would have happened.)

But... Shido-san, the way you looked at me earlier was
so attractive.
It was very aggressive.
Ha...hahaha.

(Kurumi and I talked a lot afterwards. How good the
cake tasted, and how the tea got cold while we were
doing all those things... And other things.)

...Anyways, Kurumi. You have free time after school
the day after tomorrow?

I have some business to take care of. If you don't
mind going out after that.

I see... Come to think of it, I have to finish my
project...
Is there something happening that day?

Oh, I was wondering if you wanted to watch a movie
with me. You said you wanted to go the other day,
remember?
My. You remembered?
W-Well... yeah.
Hehe... That makes me happy. And...
And...?
I'm very, very happy right now.
Me, too.

(I hugged Kurumi's shoulders tight. We could feel
each other's bodies. That heat alone taught me
something.)
So, Shido-san...

(No matter how much we talk, it's never enough.
It's just so fun to talk to Kurumi. I wish this time
would last forever. I really do.)
I really had so much fun today.
Me, too.
...Hehe.
Wh-What?
Today... I got to learn your kink. I'm very satisfied.
H-Hey, it's not like that! That was Tonomachi's...

(I tried to cover it up, but Kurumi hugged me tightly
and whispered into my ear.)

Please decide when you want to continue what we
were doing this afternoon.
What...?!
Hehehe... Well, good-bye, Shido-san...

(Kurumi said that much and waved at my bright red
face before walking off.)
